title: XDM Business Account

xdm:ownerID.title: Account Owner
xdm:ownerID.description: assigned owner of account. Not available in personal edition.

xdm:parentID.title: Parent Account
xdm:parentID.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent account must be an existing account in salesforce. You can enter the account name, or select (or optionally, create) the account using the lookup icon.

xdm:territoryID.title: Territory Id
xdm:territoryID.description: The territory to which the account has been assigned.

xdm:accountSite.title: Account Site Details
xdm:accountSite.description: Information about the account’s location, such as single location, headquarters, or branch. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:accountOrganization.title: Account Details
xdm:accountOrganization.description: Account details like number of employees, market segment, industry, and location.

xdm:accountName.title: Account Name
xdm:accountName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:ownership.title: Ownership
xdm:ownership.description: Ownership of company, for example, public or private. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

xdm:deleted.title: Account Record Deleted Indicator
xdm:deleted.description: Indicator whether the Account record is deleted or not.
